name: Space Invaders in your browser
description:
A fun re-imagining of the retro classic by Tomohiro Nishikado and Taito.

Play in the traditional 2D mode - much faster and smoother than the original - or in 3D. The 3D mode is the same game from a different perspective.

This project was built in Javascript using the BabylonJS framework.

Sound effects are from "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection (512 sounds)" by Juhani Junkala. Released under creative commons license.
